trans-unit.source: Record Selection Type / Allow or Show records by selection type
All Records on selected Storage Page(s)
Target record display plugin, which will follow this plugin
Information about the Field/Value Filter Settings
Search through record title and fields
Class Name of the according model (Leave Blank for Array-Return)
Initial Number of records to show
List of entries for 'Per Page'-Field. (Comma separated)
Add records to your site. This plugin offers different possibilities to integrate records.
Adds a search form to your site to search record contents.
Add a letter selection (A,B,C etc.) to your site to filter records by the selected letter.
Add a form for sorting records to your site.
Adds an filter form to your site to show only records that are valid for the selected filters.
Adds an record selection form to your site where records can be selected and used in the record plugin.
Adds an Form to the site for saving and validating form data which is passed from a template.
Please select a plugin type in the plugin settings
No fieldtypes found. Please add the DataViewer Static to your site-template or add at least one fieldtype (plugin.tx_dataviewer.fieldtypes)
No Record Storage Page is configured. Please first add a Record Storage Page and press 'Save'.
Use this id in the 'Target record display plugin'-Setting for Linking other DataViewer plugins to this!
Sorry, creating new records is not allowed by this plugin!
Sorry, editing records is not allowed by this plugin!
Sorry, deleting records is not allowed by this plugin!
The DataViewer Extension had to clear the cache to reload all fieldtypes. If there are no fieldtypes available, please try to clear the caches manually.
See TCA Reference for more information.
Hide Records of this type in lists
Hide Button to Add new Record
Name of the Tab to add to
Pretends to be an empty value
Please select a datatype to continue
This field doesn't support different field value types. Please add a fixed value!
This fieldtype doesn't support dynamic database values.
This fieldtype doesn't support database and dynamic database values.
The field '%s' has no field values. Please add at least one field value!
There is currently no inline configuration available for this field type!
Datatype does not contain fields. Please add fields to this datatype.
Record with Id '%s' was successfully deleted.
Could not delete Record with Id '%s'.
Field with Id '%s' and according record values were successfully deleted.
FieldValue with Id '%s' and according record values were successfully deleted.
The field '%s' is required. Please fill out all values.
The inline element only works with database field values.
The database element only works with database field values.
This plugin is not yet configured.
Record is now hidden. Please fix the displayed errors first and then remove the 'Hide'-Check.
Attach Values from Database for Frontend
The Form-Value is accessible in frontend with the following fluid code:
The search requires minimum of %s characters.
A field class '%s' does not exist!
Single Value of a comma-separated List (FIND_IN_SET)
Please regard the selection limit of %s entries.
This module manages records of different type. You can easily manage or add records to the selected page.
There are %s records on this page
There are %s datatypes on this page
Create a new record on this page
No records were found on this page.
No datatypes were found on this page.
Please click on an entry in the following table to open details for the selected entry.
Please select a page in the pagetree.
Please select a page from the pagetree, where the imported records will be stored.
Please select the target datatype for the imported records. This datatype is used for assigning the data of the imported file.
Please select the CSV-File from your computer. The file is uploaded once into a temporary directory and will be deleted from the server after the import is finished.
Please assign the columns from the CSV-File to the according field of the datatype. All data of this column will be imported to the selected field if the validation is passed.
Thank you for using the DataViewer CSV-Import. The final log is displayed in the following lines.
First Line is Header with column names
No file given. Please select a file to continue.
The selected file is empty or cannot be read. Please try again!
